verses.plain: Ye shall make you no idols nor graven image, neither rear you up a standing image, neither shall ye set up any image of stone in your land, to bow down unto it: for I am the LORD your God.

tokens.t: Ye shall make you no idols nor graven image, neither rear you up a standing image, neither shall ye set up
image of stone in your land, to bow down unto it: for I
the
your God.

verses.plain: ¶ Ye shall keep my sabbaths, and reverence my sanctuary: I am the LORD.

tokens.t: ¶ Ye shall keep my sabbaths, and reverence my sanctuary: I
the

verses.plain: ¶ If ye walk in my statutes, and keep my commandments, and do them;

tokens.t: ¶ If ye walk in my statutes, and keep my commandments, and do them;

verses.plain: Then I will give you rain in due season, and the land shall yield her increase, and the trees of the field shall yield their fruit.

tokens.t: Then I will give you rain in due season, and the land shall yield her increase, and the trees of the field shall yield their fruit.

verses.plain: And your threshing shall reach unto the vintage, and the vintage shall reach unto the sowing time: and ye shall eat your bread to the full, and dwell in your land safely.

tokens.t: And your threshing shall reach unto the vintage, and the vintage shall reach unto the sowing time: and ye shall eat your bread to the full, and dwell in your land safely.

verses.plain: And I will give peace in the land, and ye shall lie down, and none shall make you afraid: and I will rid evil beasts out of the land, neither shall the sword go through your land.

tokens.t: And I will give peace in the land, and ye shall lie down, and none shall make
afraid: and I will rid evil beasts out of the land, neither shall the sword go through your land.

verses.plain: And ye shall chase your enemies, and they shall fall before you by the sword.

tokens.t: And ye shall chase your enemies, and they shall fall before you by the sword.

verses.plain: And five of you shall chase an hundred, and an hundred of you shall put ten thousand to flight: and your enemies shall fall before you by the sword.

tokens.t: And five of you shall chase an hundred, and an hundred of you shall put ten thousand to flight: and your enemies shall fall before you by the sword.

verses.plain: For I will have respect unto you, and make you fruitful, and multiply you, and establish my covenant with you.

tokens.t: For I will have respect unto you, and make you fruitful, and multiply you, and establish my covenant with you.

verses.plain: And ye shall eat old store, and bring forth the old because of the new.

tokens.t: And ye shall eat old store, and bring forth the old because of the new.

verses.plain: And I will set my tabernacle among you: and my soul shall not abhor you.

tokens.t: And I will set my tabernacle among you: and my soul shall not abhor you.

verses.plain: And I will walk among you, and will be your God, and ye shall be my people.

tokens.t: And I will walk among you, and will be your God, and ye shall be my people.

verses.plain: I am the LORD your God, which brought you forth out of the land of Egypt, that ye should not be their bondmen; and I have broken the bands of your yoke, and made you go upright.

tokens.t: I
the
your God, which brought you forth out of the land of Egypt, that ye should not be their bondmen; and I have broken the bands of your yoke, and made you go upright.

verses.plain: ¶ But if ye will not hearken unto me, and will not do all these commandments;

tokens.t: ¶ But if ye will not hearken unto me, and will not do all these commandments;

verses.plain: And if ye shall despise my statutes, or if your soul abhor my judgments, so that ye will not do all my commandments, but that ye break my covenant:

tokens.t: And if ye shall despise my statutes, or if your soul abhor my judgments, so that ye will not do all my commandments,
that ye break my covenant:

verses.plain: I also will do this unto you; I will even appoint over you terror, consumption, and the burning ague, that shall consume the eyes, and cause sorrow of heart: and ye shall sow your seed in vain, for your enemies shall eat it.

tokens.t: I also will do this unto you; I will even appoint over you terror, consumption, and the burning ague, that shall consume the eyes, and cause sorrow of heart: and ye shall sow your seed in vain, for your enemies shall eat it.

verses.plain: And I will set my face against you, and ye shall be slain before your enemies: they that hate you shall reign over you; and ye shall flee when none pursueth you.

tokens.t: And I will set my face against you, and ye shall be slain before your enemies: they that hate you shall reign over you; and ye shall flee when none pursueth you.

verses.plain: And if ye will not yet for all this hearken unto me, then I will punish you seven times more for your sins.

tokens.t: And if ye will not yet for all this hearken unto me, then I will punish you seven times more for your sins.

verses.plain: And I will break the pride of your power; and I will make your heaven as iron, and your earth as brass:

tokens.t: And I will break the pride of your power; and I will make your heaven as iron, and your earth as brass:

verses.plain: And your strength shall be spent in vain: for your land shall not yield her increase, neither shall the trees of the land yield their fruits.

tokens.t: And your strength shall be spent in vain: for your land shall not yield her increase, neither shall the trees of the land yield their fruits.

verses.plain: ¶ And if ye walk contrary unto me, and will not hearken unto me; I will bring seven times more plagues upon you according to your sins.

tokens.t: ¶ And if ye walk contrary unto me, and will not hearken unto me; I will bring seven times more plagues upon you according to your sins.

verses.plain: I will also send wild beasts among you, which shall rob you of your children, and destroy your cattle, and make you few in number; and your high ways shall be desolate.

tokens.t: I will also send wild beasts among you, which shall rob you of your children, and destroy your cattle, and make you few in number; and your
ways shall be desolate.

verses.plain: And if ye will not be reformed by me by these things, but will walk contrary unto me;

tokens.t: And if ye will not be reformed by me by these things, but will walk contrary unto me;

verses.plain: Then will I also walk contrary unto you, and will punish you yet seven times for your sins.

tokens.t: Then will I also walk contrary unto you, and will punish you yet seven times for your sins.

verses.plain: And I will bring a sword upon you, that shall avenge the quarrel of my covenant: and when ye are gathered together within your cities, I will send the pestilence among you; and ye shall be delivered into the hand of the enemy.

tokens.t: And I will bring a sword upon you, that shall avenge the quarrel of
covenant: and when ye are gathered together within your cities, I will send the pestilence among you; and ye shall be delivered into the hand of the enemy.

verses.plain: And when I have broken the staff of your bread, ten women shall bake your bread in one oven, and they shall deliver you your bread again by weight: and ye shall eat, and not be satisfied.

tokens.t: when I have broken the staff of your bread, ten women shall bake your bread in one oven, and they shall deliver
your bread again by weight: and ye shall eat, and not be satisfied.

verses.plain: And if ye will not for all this hearken unto me, but walk contrary unto me;

tokens.t: And if ye will not for all this hearken unto me, but walk contrary unto me;

verses.plain: Then I will walk contrary unto you also in fury; and I, even I, will chastise you seven times for your sins.

tokens.t: Then I will walk contrary unto you also in fury; and I, even I, will chastise you seven times for your sins.

verses.plain: And ye shall eat the flesh of your sons, and the flesh of your daughters shall ye eat.

tokens.t: And ye shall eat the flesh of your sons, and the flesh of your daughters shall ye eat.

verses.plain: And I will destroy your high places, and cut down your images, and cast your carcases upon the carcases of your idols, and my soul shall abhor you.

tokens.t: And I will destroy your high places, and cut down your images, and cast your carcases upon the carcases of your idols, and my soul shall abhor you.

verses.plain: And I will make your cities waste, and bring your sanctuaries unto desolation, and I will not smell the savour of your sweet odours.

tokens.t: And I will make your cities waste, and bring your sanctuaries unto desolation, and I will not smell the savour of your sweet odours.

verses.plain: And I will bring the land into desolation: and your enemies which dwell therein shall be astonished at it.

tokens.t: And I will bring the land into desolation: and your enemies which dwell therein shall be astonished at it.

verses.plain: And I will scatter you among the heathen, and will draw out a sword after you: and your land shall be desolate, and your cities waste.

tokens.t: And I will scatter you among the heathen, and will draw out a sword after you: and your land shall be desolate, and your cities waste.

verses.plain: Then shall the land enjoy her sabbaths, as long as it lieth desolate, and ye be in your enemies’ land; even then shall the land rest, and enjoy her sabbaths.

tokens.t: Then shall the land enjoy her sabbaths, as long as it lieth desolate, and ye
in your enemies’ land;
then shall the land rest, and enjoy her sabbaths.

verses.plain: As long as it lieth desolate it shall rest; because it did not rest in your sabbaths, when ye dwelt upon it.

tokens.t: As long as it lieth desolate it shall rest; because it did not rest in your sabbaths, when ye dwelt upon it.

verses.plain: And upon them that are left alive of you I will send a faintness into their hearts in the lands of their enemies; and the sound of a shaken leaf shall chase them; and they shall flee, as fleeing from a sword; and they shall fall when none pursueth.

tokens.t: And upon them that are left

of you I will send a faintness into their hearts in the lands of their enemies; and the sound of a shaken leaf shall chase them; and they shall flee, as fleeing from a sword; and they shall fall when none pursueth.

verses.plain: And they shall fall one upon another, as it were before a sword, when none pursueth: and ye shall have no power to stand before your enemies.

tokens.t: And they shall fall one upon another, as it were before a sword, when none pursueth: and ye shall have no power to stand before your enemies.

verses.plain: And ye shall perish among the heathen, and the land of your enemies shall eat you up.

tokens.t: And ye shall perish among the heathen, and the land of your enemies shall eat you up.

verses.plain: And they that are left of you shall pine away in their iniquity in your enemies’ lands; and also in the iniquities of their fathers shall they pine away with them.

tokens.t: And they that are left of you shall pine away in their iniquity in your enemies’ lands; and also in the iniquities of their fathers shall they pine away with them.

verses.plain: If they shall confess their iniquity, and the iniquity of their fathers, with their trespass which they trespassed against me, and that also they have walked contrary unto me;

tokens.t: If they shall confess their iniquity, and the iniquity of their fathers, with their trespass which they trespassed against me, and that also they have walked contrary unto me;

verses.plain: And that I also have walked contrary unto them, and have brought them into the land of their enemies; if then their uncircumcised hearts be humbled, and they then accept of the punishment of their iniquity:

tokens.t: And
I also have walked contrary unto them, and have brought them into the land of their enemies; if then their uncircumcised hearts be humbled, and they then accept of the punishment of their iniquity:

verses.plain: Then will I remember my covenant with Jacob, and also my covenant with Isaac, and also my covenant with Abraham will I remember; and I will remember the land.

tokens.t: Then will I remember my covenant with Jacob, and also my covenant with Isaac, and also my covenant with Abraham will I remember; and I will remember the land.

verses.plain: The land also shall be left of them, and shall enjoy her sabbaths, while she lieth desolate without them: and they shall accept of the punishment of their iniquity: because, even because they despised my judgments, and because their soul abhorred my statutes.

tokens.t: The land also shall be left of them, and shall enjoy her sabbaths, while she lieth desolate without them: and they shall accept of the punishment of their iniquity: because, even because they despised my judgments, and because their soul abhorred my statutes.

verses.plain: And yet for all that, when they be in the land of their enemies, I will not cast them away, neither will I abhor them, to destroy them utterly, and to break my covenant with them: for I am the LORD their God.

tokens.t: And yet for all that, when they be in the land of their enemies, I will not cast them away, neither will I abhor them, to destroy them utterly, and to break my covenant with them: for I
the
their God.

verses.plain: But I will for their sakes remember the covenant of their ancestors, whom I brought forth out of the land of Egypt in the sight of the heathen, that I might be their God: I am the LORD.

tokens.t: But I will for their sakes remember the covenant of their ancestors, whom I brought forth out of the land of Egypt in the sight of the heathen, that I might be their God: I
the

verses.plain: These are the statutes and judgments and laws, which the LORD made between him and the children of Israel in mount Sinai by the hand of Moses.

tokens.t: These
the statutes and judgments and laws, which the
made between him and the children of Israel in mount Sinai by the hand of Moses.

footnotes.text: image of…: or, figured stone: Heb. a stone of picture
contrary…: or, at all adventures with me
